CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 9, 1964, pg. 6 reads: "Mr. and Mrs. Morris Fountain Jr....bride and groom - Harris Photo." Portion of accompanying article reads: "The Church of the Holy Cross (Episcopal) was the scene, April 25, of the wedding rites of Marilyn Ruth Thomas and Morris Steven Fountain Jr.  The bride, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Roger P. Thomas and the groom, son of Mr. and Mrs. Morris S. Fountain Sr., both are from pioneer families of Pittsburgh."
TitMainTitle: Bride Marilyn Ruth Thomas Fountain and groom Morris Steven Fountain, Jr. walking out of Holy Cross Episcopal church
